topics.body:
I have to say. Power Rangers RPM looks like one the few Power Rangers that sounds interesting to me.

I dig the post apocalyptic setting, The Mad Max vibe, the fact that they reference "hey this is kinda goofy", the idea of Venjix is neat and most of all. The sky whale.

!http://linearranger.com/RPMPics/WhaleZord01.PNG!

I don't even care if it's a transforming robot. It's a whale.

And I. Fucking. Love. Whales.
